data.title: Groningen → Braunschweig by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Groningen to Braunschweig in 4h 38m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Groningen to Braunschweig today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Groningen to Braunschweig by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 5 hours 49 minutes to travel from Groningen to Braunschweig by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 4 hours 38 minutes though. You'll usually find 37 trains per day running along the 178 miles (287 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 1 change during the journey to Braunschweig, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route. Trains on this route are usually operated by either ICE or DB. On board you'll find modern comfortable seating and plenty of room for luggage as standard.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Groningen to Braunschweig.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Braunschweig by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
